publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2740 Mr Mark Ruskell: Alleged Breaches of Traffic Law by Ministry of Defence—That the Parliament is concerned about allegations that nuclear warhead convoys running between Burghfield and Coulport have contravened traffic laws by travelling on weight-restricted roads and bridges in the Stirling area with 48-tonne nuclear transporters that are several times in excess of legal weight limits and urges swift investigation and appropriate action by Central Scotland Police.

S2M-2740 Mr Mark Ruskell:Alleged Breaches of Traffic Law by Ministry of Defence—That the Parliament is concerned about allegations that nuclear warhead convoys running between Burghfield and Coulport have contravened traffic laws by travelling on weight-restricted roads and bridges in the Stirling area with 48-tonne nuclear transporters that are several times in excess of legal weight limits and urges swift investigation and appropriate action by Central Scotland Police.
S2M-2740 Alleged Breaches of Traffic Law by Ministry of Defence (lodged on 28 April 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2740 Alleged Breaches of Traffic Law by Ministry of Defence (lodged on 28 April 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2740 Alleged Breaches of Traffic Law by Ministry of Defence (lodged on 28 April 2005) Ms Sandra White*
